summary: EXHAUST IN CABIN  LEASED NEW 2016 FORD EXPLORER XLT MARCH OF 2016. IMMEDIATELY SMELLED EXHAUST IN CABIN UPON ACCELERATION. TOOK BACK TO DEALER. TOLD IT WAS FIXED. IT WAS NOT. STILL SMELL EXHAUST. DAUGHTER FEELS SICK RIDING IN BACK SEAT. TOOK BACK TO DEALER. TOLD THEY NEED CAR A FEW DAYS. WAS GIVEN NO EXPLANATION. ASKED FOR LOANER CAR. WAS REFUSED. MANAGER OUT FOR 2 MORE DAYS SO WILL WAIT UNTIL HE IS IN TO SPEAK TO. WAS TREATED RUDELY.
